mainText:
The first computer I ever bought was an Apple 
which I still have in storage! I designed my first golf club with it and 
went on to get it patented and sell many thousands of them. I have and 
use many Apple products  everyday as I'm sure many people around the 
world do. I'm sorry for the loss of Steve Jobs and my heart and prayers 
go out to his family and friends. He will be forever remembered as an  icon and one of the people that COULD...
author: Bob
